text: Lamberto Giorgis (1932 – 30 August 2019) was an Italian football player and manager. ==Playing career== Giorgis played for Taranto between 1953 and 1961, making a total of 206 appearances for the club in Serie B and Serie C. He later played for Modena and Carpi. ==Coaching career== After retiring as a player, Giorgis became a coach, and managed a number of club sides including Lecce, Sampdoria, Foggia and Pisa. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Taranto F.C. 1927 players Category:Modena F.C. players Category:Carpi F.C. 1909 players Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players Category:Italian football managers Category:U.S. Lecce managers Category:U.C. title: Lamberto Giorgis
